title: Hold the ketchup
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, William Weintraub and Albert Kish
brief_description: This is about new Canadians and what they eat. Funny, mouth-watering and visually delectable, it takes us into the specialty food shops where the ingredients are bought, and into the homes where the food is prepared and served in the traditional way.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, William Weintraub and Albert Kish
